title: Picture Day
subtle:
Realistic (fiction), 569 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 510L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and P
description: School picture day is just around the corner, and Poppy can't wait! She has picked out the perfect dress, shoes, and necklace. When a series of unforeseen events occur, however, Poppy's excitement turns to nervousness. Picture Day is a delightful story about the beauty found in our differences and what makes each one of us special. Use this story to teach students how to sequence events and accurately retell. The book and lesson are also available for levels J and P.
highFrequencyWords: beaded, burst, gasped, glanced, photographer, stain
